    <li id="cite_note-257"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-257" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFIshihara2016" class="citation book cs1">Ishihara, Masahide (2016). "Language Revitalization Efforts in the Ryukyus". In Ishihara, Masahide; Hoshino, Eiichi; Fujita, Yoko (eds.). <i>Self-determinable Development of Small Islands</i>. Springer. pp.&nbsp;6782. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-981-10-0132-1" title="Special:BookSources/978-981-10-0132-1"><bdi>978-981-10-0132-1</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.atitle=Language+Revitalization+Efforts+in+the+Ryukyus&amp;rft.btitle=Self-determinable+Development+of+Small+Islands&amp;rft.pages=67-82&amp;rft.pub=Springer&amp;rft.date=2016&amp;rft.isbn=978-981-10-0132-1&amp;rft.aulast=Ishihara&amp;rft.aufirst=Masahide&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AJapan" class="Z3988"></span></span>
    </li>
    <li id="cite_note-258"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-258" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFHudson2014" class="citation book cs1">Hudson, Mark (2014).     <li id="cite_note-287"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-287" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFRussellMetrauxTohen2017" class="citation journal cs1">Russell, Roxanne; Metraux, Daniel; Tohen, Mauricio (2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1111%2Fpcn.12428">"Cultural influences on suicide in Japan"</a>. <i>Psychiatry and Clinical Neurosciences</i>. <b>71</b> (1): 25. <a href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1111%2Fpcn.12428">10.1111/pcn.12428</a></span>. <a href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27487762">27487762</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Psychiatry+and+Clinical+Neurosciences&amp;rft.atitle=Cultural+influences+on+suicide+in+Japan&amp;rft.volume=71&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=2-5&amp;rft.date=2017&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1111%2Fpcn.12428&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F27487762&amp;rft.aulast=Russell&amp;rft.aufirst=Roxanne&amp;rft.au=Metraux%2C+Daniel&amp;rft.au=Tohen%2C+Mauricio&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1111%252Fpcn.12428&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AJapan" class="Z3988"></span></span>

    </li>
    <li id="cite_note-Batt2014-338"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Batt2014_338-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFBatt2014" class="citation book cs1">Batt, Carl A.     <li id="cite_note-356"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-356" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.tokyoweekender.com/2018/04/for-the-love-of-cars-auto-racing-in-japan/">"For the Love of Cars: Auto Racing in Japan"</a>. <i>Tokyo Weekender</i>.
